programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Pearl's Kickball Championship - It's the Neighborhood Kickball Championship! Pearl, the neighborhood's best kicker, has albinism and nystagmus, and so the teams use a Beep Kickball to play. When the ball deflates, Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out how to save the kickball game!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth - After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Name's Chomp / Cactus-Throphe - Bobbi's galactic flapjacks attract a spaceship from another galaxy. It's Captain Chomp and her co-pilot, Kenny a prehistoric mammoth! // Steel uses a super-growth fertiliser to grow giant cacti flowers to replace Lady Fluffpot's bottle of perfume.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Journey Into A Black Hole/ Paddington's Rainbow Race - When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1004
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Doctor Drama / The White Whale - After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Three is a Magic Number / Off the Map - With the help of El Guardin, the crew solves the puzzle of their new headquarters in order to unlock a secret treasure. // The crew journey to the unknown corners of the ocean and discover a real-life Sea Monster who needs their help.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1005
programme.desc: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow - The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Vigo's Surprise - Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep411
programme.desc: The Case of the Missing Thinking Chair - The Thinking Chair is MISSING! This is a mystery so huge that Josh and Blue need to call in the Blueprints Detective Agency for Steve's help. Working together, will they be able to figure out this big mystery?

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room / Little Shrimp, Big Problems - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together. // The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off / Scout's Honor / The Magic Word - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad. // Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help. // Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lil' Kimchi King and Kween / Don't Go Miss Elky / Doctor Chipper - Turtle wants to win a contest but he's up against Honey Bear. // When Bossy thinks Miss Elky is planning to leave forever, he tries to convince her to stay. // Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Deep Dark Disco / Finception - The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Pirate Parade - It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubbles dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDogs wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Blue's New Pet - It's campaign hamster versus campaign goldfish as the house votes on a new pet! When it's a tie, we play Blue's Clues to figure out who will cast the last (and deciding!) vote.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep615
programme.desc: The Boingies! - When a bunch of adorable critters called Boingies get lost in Axle City, it's up to Blaze and AJ to gather them up and get them home safe and sound.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and wont let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Adventure Bay is holding a ''kids only'' soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zo has invited all of Peppa and Georges friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Tickly - The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Raspberry - Dee encourages a friend to say 'raspberry' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today is all about raspberries - we see a red raspberry, a small raspberry, a fancy hat raspberry and a high raspberry.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Howdy There Hooper - The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cavity Cave - Messy brushes his teeth, but why must we use toothpaste and a toothbrush to get teeth clean? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Dad Dancing - Stan doesn't want to dance because he's not good at it, leaving Monty wondering whether you have to be good at things to enjoy them.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Helicopter - At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep38
programme.desc: The Caterpillar Badge - The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag makes friends with a caterpillar. She is very hungry, so Tag feeds her the vegetable leaves they have been picking.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Cardboard Box Badge - The dog gets a delivery that arrives in a big box and the squirrels discover that cardboard can be very interesting.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppy Badge - Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay. He's one cute puppy, but he looks like he could cause chaos in the clubhouse. And wait a minute - what's that terrible smell?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.desc: Queens - During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.desc: Tree-Hole Frog - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rainforests of Borneo to find out how the tree-hole frog makes itself heard in a noisy forest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun!

programme.desc: You Troll - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments.

programme.desc: Gone Gal / Time Traveler's Party - When Miss Croner has a disagreement with Miss Miller, she fakes her disappearance to get even. // Simon tells Alvin time travel is impossible, until a man from the future shows up at their home.

programme.desc: The House on Cedar Lane / Bathroom Bully - When classmates claim a local haunted house isn't that scary, Alvin decides to prove them wrong. // When Miss Smith praises Simon's grades in class, Derek bullies him by not allowing him to use the boys' bathroom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out / Neptune's Ball - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors. // The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.desc: Switch Glitch / Prickly Pests - An accident causes Patrick and Karen to switch bodies. // A mischievous camp prank goes terribly wrong.

programme.desc: Bye, Bye, Birthday / Tough Guise - Tired of the yearly cheer surrounding her birthday, Lucy casts a spell so her family will forget what day it is. // When Zach is given detention, Rusty and the rest of their friends try to toughen up him up so he'll fit in.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Road Trip: Bizarritorium - When Mom is assigned a travel article at work, she takes the entire family on a cross country road trip. But the trip gets off to a bumpy start when Lincoln tries to change Mom's itinerary to go to Dr. Weirdly's Bizarritorium.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep706
programme.desc: Road Trip: Bringing Down the House / Road Trip: Mountain Hard Pass - During a visit of the White House, the Loud kids can't help but sneak off and explore the rooms not on the tour. // Intimidated by an intense day of hiking in the Rocky Mountains, the Loud kids try to find reasons to call off the hike.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Home of the Fave / Hero Today, Gone Tomorrow - After a pun-filled trip to the grocery store with Luan and Lola, Dad worries Lola thinks he plays favorites. // When Lynn's friend Margo is celebrated for a one-ina-million soccer goal, Lynn has to try and be supportive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep285
programme.desc: Delivery to Monster Island / Ride Patrick Ride - SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive an island of deadly monsters. // SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Silent Fight - Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113

programme.title: Q+A Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 17 - Patricia Karvelas leads the conversation as citizens put their questions to local and international politicians and thought leaders. Q+A brings together a range of guests to debate the big issues affecting Australians.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep7
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night - Moreno vs. Royval 2
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Mexico City on February 24 with a stacked card featuring a host of the nations best mixed martial artists. In the main event, Mexicos first UFC champion, Brandon Moreno, continues on his road back to the flyweight crown when he faces Brandon Royval for the second time in a five-round main event showdown. Plus, its expected to be an early Fight of the Year candidate in another rematch when featherweight stars Yair Rodriguez and Brian Ortega clash in an all-action five-round battle.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night - Moreno vs. Royval 2

programme.title: UFC 298: Volkanovski vs. Topuria
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant champions in the UFC today returns to face another elite contender, as Alexander Volkanovski travels from his home in Australia to defend his featherweight crown against Spains Ilia Topuria in the main event of UFC 298 at Anaheims Honda Center on February 18. Unbeaten in 14 fights, Topuria has scored six of those wins in the UFC, and now he will look to become Spains first world champion when he meets one of the best 145-pounders of all-time, Alexander the Great, in the Octagon
